sch:schema.sch:title: Business rules voor het controleren op UBL syntax gebruik

rule.context: cbc:LongtitudeDegreesMeasure[@unitCode] | cbc:LatitudeDegreesMeasure[@unitCode] | cbc:BaseQuantity[@unitCode] | cbc:Quantity[@unitCode] | cbc:DurationMeasure[@unitCode] | cbc:Measure[@unitCode] | cbc:DeliveryItemQuantity[@unitCode] | cbc:PackQuantity[@unitCode]

XAD XAE XAF XAG XAH XAI XAJ XAL XAM XAP XAT XAV XB4 XBA XBB XBC XBD XBE XBF XBG XBH XBI XBJ XBK XBL XBM XBN XBO XBP XBQ XBR XBS XBT XBU XBV XBW XBX XBY XBZ XCA XCB XCC XCD XCE XCF XCG XCH XCI XCJ XCK XFP XFR XFT XFW XFX XGB XGI XGL XGR XGU XGY XGZ XHA XHB XHC XHG XHN XHR XIA XIB XIC XID XIE XIF XIG XIH XIK XIL XIN XIZ XJB XJC XJG XJR XJT XJY XKG XKI XLE XLG XLT XLU XLV XLZ XMA XMB XMC XME XMR XMS XMT XMW XMX XNA XNE XNF XNG XNS XNT XNU XNV XO1 XO2 XO3 XO4 XO5 XO6 XO7 XO8 XO9 XOA XOB XOC XOD XOE XOF XOG XOH XOI XOJ XOK XOL XOM XON XOP XOQ XOR XOS XOT XOU XOV XOW XOX XOY XOZ XP1 XP2 XP3 XP4 XPA XPB XPC XPD XPE XPF XPG XPH XPI XPJ XPK XPL XPN XPO XPP XPR XPT XPU XPV XPX XPY XPZ XQA XQB XQC XQD XQF XQG XQH XQJ XQK XQL XQM XQN XQP XQQ XQR XQS XRD XRG XRJ XRK XRL XRO XRT XRZ XSA XSB XSC XSD XSE XSH XSI XSK XSL XSM XSO XSP XSS XST XSU XSV XSW XSX XSY XSZ XT1 XTB XTC XTD XTE XTG XTI XTK XTL XTN XTO XTR XTS XTT XTU XTV XTW XTY XTZ XUC XUN XVA XVG XVI XVK XVL XVN XVO XVP XVQ XVR XVS XVY XWA XWB XWC XWD XWF XWG XWH XWJ XWK XWL XWM XWN XWP XWQ XWR XWS XWT XWU XWV XWW XWX XWY XWZ XXA XXB XXC XXD XXF XXG XXH XXJ XXK XYA XYB XYC XYD XYF XYG XYH XYJ XYK XYL XYM XYN XYP XYQ XYR XYS XYT XYV XYW XYX XYY XYZ XZA XZB XZC XZD XZF XZG XZH XZJ XZK XZL XZM XZN XZP XZQ XZR XZS XZT XZU XZV XZW XZX XZY XZZ ', concat(' ', normalize-space(@unitCode), ' '))))

rule.assert: Unit code MUST be coded according to the UN/ECE Recommendation 20 with Rec 21 extension

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: An Order SHOULD not contain UBLExtensions.
An Order SHOULD not contain UBLVersionID.
An Order SHOULD not contain CustomizationID.
An Order SHOULD not contain ProfileID.
An Order SHOULD not contain ProfileExecutionID.
An Order SHOULD not contain SalesOrderID.
An Order SHOULD not contain CopyIndicator.
An Order SHOULD not contain UUID.
An Order SHOULD not contain IssueTime.
An Order SHOULD not contain RequestedInvoiceCurrencyCode.
An Order SHOULD not contain DocumentCurrencyCode.
An Order SHOULD not contain PricingCurrencyCode.
An Order SHOULD not contain TaxCurrencyCode.
An Order SHOULD not contain CustomerReference.
An Order SHOULD not contain AccountingCostCode.
An Order SHOULD not contain AccountingCost.
An Order SHOULD not contain LineCountNumeric.
An Order SHOULD not contain ValidityPeriod.
An Order SHOULD not contain OrderDocumentReference.
An Order SHOULD not contain OriginatorDocumentReference.
An Order SHOULD not contain CatalogueReference.
An Order SHOULD not contain ProjectReference.
An Order SHOULD not contain Signature.
An Order SHOULD not contain OriginatorCustomerParty.
An Order SHOULD not contain FreightForwarderParty.
An Order SHOULD not contain Delivery.
An Order SHOULD not contain PaymentMeans.
An Order SHOULD not contain TaxExchangeRate.
An Order SHOULD not contain PricingExchangeRate.
An Order SHOULD not contain PaymentExchangeRate.
An Order SHOULD not contain DestinationCountry.
An Order SHOULD not contain TotalTax.

Al in de tijd van de Egyptenaren werd er nagedacht over hoe de informatie voorziening omtrent het bouwen van Piramides geautomatiseerd kon worden. Farao Arthur legde hier de beginselen voor het SCSN gedachtengoed. Wij zijn hem eeuwig dankbaar.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: OrderType is mandatory.
Accounting customer party is mandatory.
Contract reference information is only allowed once.
Contract document reference information is only allowed once.
Contract information has to include a contract document reference.
Transaction conditions are only allowed once.
Payment terms are only allowed once.
Delivery terms are only allowed once.
Either PhysicalLocation or DeliveryLocation should be present

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: Order type MUST be specified as 'Changed' or 'New'.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: This element SHOULD not contain a schemeID attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a schemeName attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a schemeAgencyID attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a schemeAgencyName attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a schemeVersionID attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a schemeDataURI attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a schemeURI attribute.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: This element SHOULD not contain a listID attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a listAgencyID attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a listAgencyName attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a listName attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a listVersionID attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a name attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a languageID attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a listURI attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a listSchemeURI attribute.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: This element SHOULD not contain a languageID attribute.
This element SHOULD not contain a languageLocaleID attribute.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: This element SHOULD not contain an unitCodeListVersionID attribute.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: This element SHOULD not contain a currencyCodeListVersionID attribute.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: This element SHOULD not contain a format attribute.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: An AllowanceCharge SHOULD not contain an ID.
An AllowanceCharge SHOULD not contain an AllowanceChargeReason.
An AllowanceCharge SHOULD not contain a PrepaidIndicator.
An AllowanceCharge SHOULD not contain a SequenceNumeric.
An Amount SHOULD not contain a currencyCodeListVersionID attribute.
An AllowanceCharge SHOULD not contain a BaseAmount.
An AllowanceCharge SHOULD not contain an AccountingCostCode.
An AllowanceCharge SHOULD not contain an AccountingCost.
An AllowanceCharge SHOULD not contain a PerUnitAmount.
An AllowanceCharge SHOULD not contain a TaxCategory.
An AllowanceCharge SHOULD not contain a TaxTotal.
An AllowanceCharge SHOULD not contain a PaymentMeans.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: This UBL element SHOULD not be used.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: Party is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: PartyIdentification is mandatory.
PartyIdentification is only allowed once.
A PartyTaxScheme is only allowed once.
A PartyLegalEntity is only allowed once.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: A party SHOULD not contain a MarkCareIndicator.
A party SHOULD not contain a MarkAttentionIndicator.
A party SHOULD not contain a WebsiteURI.
A party SHOULD not contain a LogoReferenceID.
A party SHOULD not contain a EndPointID.
A party SHOULD not contain a IndustryClassificationCode.
A party SHOULD not contain a Language.
A party SHOULD not contain a AgentParty.
A party SHOULD not contain a ServiceProviderParty.
A party SHOULD not contain a PowerOfAttorney.
A party SHOULD not contain a FinancialAccount.
A PartyTaxScheme SHOULD not contain a RegistrationName.
A PartyTaxScheme SHOULD not contain a TaxLevelCode.
A PartyTaxScheme SHOULD not contain a ExemptionReasonCode.
A PartyTaxScheme SHOULD not contain a ExemptionReason.
A PartyTaxScheme SHOULD not contain a RegistrationAddress.
A TaxScheme SHOULD not contain a ID.
A TaxScheme SHOULD not contain a Name.
A TaxScheme SHOULD not contain a TaxTypeCode.
A TaxScheme SHOULD not contain a CurrencyCode.
A TaxScheme SHOULD not contain a JurisdictionRegionAddress.
A PartyLegalEntity SHOULD not contain a RegistrationName.
A PartyLegalEntity SHOULD not contain a RegistrationDate.
A PartyLegalEntity SHOULD not contain a RegistrationExpirationDate.
A PartyLegalEntity SHOULD not contain a CompanyLegalFormCode.
A PartyLegalEntity SHOULD not contain a CompanyLegalForm.
A PartyLegalEntity SHOULD not contain a SoleProprietorshipIndicator.
A PartyLegalEntity SHOULD not contain a CompanyLiquidationStatusCode.
A PartyLegalEntity SHOULD not contain a CorporateStockAmount.
A PartyLegalEntity SHOULD not contain a FullyPaidSharesIndicator.
A PartyLegalEntity SHOULD not contain a RegistrationAddress.
A PartyLegalEntity SHOULD not contain a CorporateRegistrationScheme.
A PartyLegalEntity SHOULD not contain a HeadOfficeParty.
A PartyLegalEntity SHOULD not contain a ShareholderParty.
A Person SHOULD not contain an ID.
A Person SHOULD not contain a MiddleName.
A Person SHOULD not contain an OtherName.
A Person SHOULD not contain a NameSuffix.
A Person SHOULD not contain a NationalityID.
A Person SHOULD not contain a GenderCode.
A Person SHOULD not contain a BirthDate.
A Person SHOULD not contain a BirthplaceName.
A Person SHOULD not contain a FinancialAccount.
A Person SHOULD not contain an IdentityDocumentReference.
A Person SHOULD not contain a ResidenceAddress.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: The attribute schemeName is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: An ID SHOULD not contain a schemeName attribute.
An ID SHOULD not contain a schemeAgencyID attribute.
An ID SHOULD not contain a schemeAgencyName attribute.
An ID SHOULD not contain a schemeVersionID attribute.
An ID SHOULD not contain a schemeDataURI attribute.
An ID SHOULD not contain a schemeURI attribute.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: OtherCommunication is only allowed once.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: A Contact SHOULD not contain an ID.
A Contact SHOULD not contain a Name.
A Contact SHOULD not contain a Note.
OtherCommunication SHOULD not contain a ChannelCode.
OtherCommunication SHOULD not contain a Channel.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: FamilyName is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: Description is only allowed once.
LocationCoordinate is only allowed once.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: A Location SHOULD not contain Conditions.
A Location SHOULD not contain a CountrySubentity.
A Location SHOULD not contain a CountrySubentityCode.
A Location SHOULD not contain a LocationTypeCode.
A Location SHOULD not contain a InformationURI.
A Location SHOULD not contain a Name.
A Location SHOULD not contain a ValidityPeriod.
A Location SHOULD not contain a SubsidiaryLocation.
A LocationCoordinate SHOULD not contain a LatitudeMinutesMeasure.
A LocationCoordinate SHOULD not contain a LatitudeDirectionCode.
A LocationCoordinate SHOULD not contain a LongitudeMinutesMeasure.
A LocationCoordinate SHOULD not contain a LongitudeDirectionCode.
A LocationCoordinate SHOULD not contain a AltitudeMeasure.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: CoordinateSystem MUST be specified as 'ETRS89', 'GRS80' or 'WGS84'.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: AddressLine is only allowed once.
BuildingNumber is mandatory.
PostalZone is mandatory.
Country identification code is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: An Address SHOULD not contain ID.
An Address SHOULD not contain AddressTypeCode.
An Address SHOULD not contain AddressFormatCode.
An Address SHOULD not contain Postbox.
An Address SHOULD not contain Floor.
An Address SHOULD not contain Room.
An Address SHOULD not contain BlockName.
An Address SHOULD not contain BuildingName.
An Address SHOULD not contain InhouseMail.
An Address SHOULD not contain Department.
An Address SHOULD not contain MarkAttention.
An Address SHOULD not contain MarkCare.
An Address SHOULD not contain PlotIdentification.
An Address SHOULD not contain CitySubdivisionName.
An Address SHOULD not contain CountrySubentity.
An Address SHOULD not contain CountrySubentityCode.
An Address SHOULD not contain Region.
An Address SHOULD not contain District.
An Address SHOULD not contain TimezoneOffset.
An Country SHOULD not contain Name.
An Address SHOULD not contain LocationCoordinate.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: This UBL element SHOULD not be used.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: This UBL element SHOULD not be used.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: DeliveryTerms SHOULD not contain SpecialTerms.
DeliveryTerms SHOULD not contain LossRiskResponsibilityCode.
DeliveryTerms SHOULD not contain LossRisk.
DeliveryTerms SHOULD not contain Amount.
DeliveryTerms SHOULD not contain AllowanceCharge.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: ID is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: The attribute schemeName is mandatory.
This UBL element SHOULD be filled with a fixed value.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: An ID SHOULD not contain a schemeID attribute.
An ID SHOULD not contain a schemeAgencyID attribute.
An ID SHOULD not contain a schemeAgencyName attribute.
An ID SHOULD not contain a schemeVersionID attribute.
An ID SHOULD not contain a schemeDataURI attribute.
An ID SHOULD not contain a schemeURI attribute.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: Note is only allowed once.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain PaymentMeansID.
PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain PrepaidPaymentReferenceID.
PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain ReferenceEventCode.
PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain PenaltySurchargePercent.
PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain PaymentPercent.
PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain Amount.
PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain PenaltyAmount.
PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain PaymentTermsDetailsURI.
PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain PaymentDueDate.
PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain InstallmentDueDate.
PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain InvoicingPartyReference.
PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain PenaltyPeriod.
PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain ExchangeRate.
PaymentTerms SHOULD not contain ValidityPeriod.
SettlementPeriod SHOULD not contain StartDate.
SettlementPeriod SHOULD not contain StartTime.
SettlementPeriod SHOULD not contain EndDate.
SettlementPeriod SHOULD not contain EndTime.
SettlementPeriod SHOULD not contain DescriptionCode.
SettlementPeriod SHOULD not contain Description.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: Description is only allowed once.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: This UBL element SHOULD not be used.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: This UBL element SHOULD not be used.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: An OrderLine SHOULD not contain SubstitutionStatusCode.
An OrderLine SHOULD not contain Note.
An OrderLine SHOULD not contain SellerProposedSubstituteLineItem.
An OrderLine SHOULD not contain SellerSubstitutedLineItem.
An OrderLine SHOULD not contain BuyerProposedSubstituteLineItem.
An OrderLine SHOULD not contain CatalogueLineReference.
An OrderLine SHOULD not contain QuotationLineReference.
An OrderLine SHOULD not contain OrderLineReference.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: LineItem is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: A DocumentReference SHOULD not contain CopyIndicator.
A DocumentReference SHOULD not contain UUID.
A DocumentReference SHOULD not contain IssueTime.
A DocumentReference SHOULD not contain DocumentTypeCode.
A DocumentReference SHOULD not contain XPath.
A DocumentReference SHOULD not contain LanguageID.
A DocumentReference SHOULD not contain LocaleCode.
A DocumentReference SHOULD not contain DocumentStatusCode.
A DocumentReference SHOULD not contain DocumentDescription.
A DocumentReference SHOULD not contain ValidityPeriod.
A DocumentReference SHOULD not contain IssuerParty.
A DocumentReference SHOULD not contain ResultOfVerification.
An EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject SHOULD not contain a format attribute.
An EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject SHOULD not contain an encodingCode attribute.
An EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject SHOULD not contain a characterSetCode attribute.
An EmbeddedDocumentBinaryObject SHOULD not contain an uri attribute.
An Attachment SHOULD not contain HashAlgorithmMethod.
An Attachment SHOULD not contain ExpiryDate.
An Attachment SHOULD not contain ExpiryTime.
An Attachment SHOULD not contain FormatCode.
An Attachment SHOULD not contain EncodingCode.
An Attachment SHOULD not contain CharacterSetCode.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: DocumentType is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: A LineItem SHOULD not contain SalesOrderID.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain UUID.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain TotalTaxAmount.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain MinimumQuantity.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain MaximumQuantity.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain MinimumBackorderQuantity.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain MaximumBackorderQuantity.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain InspectionMethodCode.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain PartialDeliveryIndicator.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain BackOrderAllowedIndicator.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain AccountingCostCode.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain AccountingCost.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain WarrantyInformation.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain DeliveryTerms.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain OrderedShipment.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain PricingReference.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain AllowanceCharge.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain WarrantyValidityPeriod.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain WarrantyParty.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain TaxTotal.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain ItemPriceExtension.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain LineReference.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: Quantity is mandatory.
Delivery is mandatory.
Price is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: The attribute unitCode is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: A Quantity SHOULD not contain an unitCodeListID attribute.
A Quantity SHOULD not contain an unitCodeListAgencyID attribute.
A Quantity SHOULD not contain an unitCodeListAgencyName attribute.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: LineStatusCode MUST be specified as 'accepted', 'rejected', 'added', 'cancelled', 'disputed' or 'revised'.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: An Item SHOULD not contain PackQuantity.
An Item SHOULD not contain PackSizeNumeric.
An Item SHOULD not contain CatalogueIndicator.
An Item SHOULD not contain HazardousRiskIndicator.
An Item SHOULD not contain AdditionalInformation.
An Item SHOULD not contain Keyword.
An Item SHOULD not contain BrandName.
An Item SHOULD not contain ModelName.
An Item SHOULD not contain ManufacturersItemIdentification.
An Item SHOULD not contain CatalogueItemIdentification.
An Item SHOULD not contain AdditionalItemIdentification.
An Item SHOULD not contain CatalogueDocumentReference.
An Item SHOULD not contain OriginCountry.
An Item SHOULD not contain CommodityClassification.
An Item SHOULD not contain TransactionConditions.
An Item SHOULD not contain HazardousItem.
An Item SHOULD not contain ClassifiedTaxCategory.
An Item SHOULD not contain InformationContentProviderParty.
An Item SHOULD not contain OriginAddress.
An ItemInstance SHOULD not contain ProductTraceID.
An ItemInstance SHOULD not contain ManufactureDate.
An ItemInstance SHOULD not contain ManufactureTime.
An ItemInstance SHOULD not contain BestBeforeDate.
An ItemInstance SHOULD not contain RegistrationID.
A SerialID SHOULD not contain a schemeID attribute.
A SerialID SHOULD not contain a schemeName attribute.
A SerialID SHOULD not contain a schemeAgencyID attribute.
A SerialID SHOULD not contain a schemeAgencyName attribute.
A SerialID SHOULD not contain a schemeVersionID attribute.
A SerialID SHOULD not contain a schemeDataURI attribute.
A SerialID SHOULD not contain a schemeURI attribute.
An ItemInstance SHOULD not contain AdditionalItemProperty.
A LotIdentification SHOULD not contain ExpiryDate.
A LotIdentification SHOULD not contain AdditionalItemProperty.
An Item SHOULD not contain Certificate.
An AdditionalItemProperty SHOULD not contain an ID.
An AdditionalItemProperty SHOULD not contain a NameCode.
An AdditionalItemProperty SHOULD not contain a TestMethod.
An AdditionalItemProperty SHOULD not contain a ValueQuantity.
An AdditionalItemProperty SHOULD not contain a ValueQualifier.
An AdditionalItemProperty SHOULD not contain an ImportanceCode.
An AdditionalItemProperty SHOULD not contain a ListValue.
An AdditionalItemProperty SHOULD not contain an UsabilityPeriod.
An AdditionalItemProperty SHOULD not contain an ItemPropertyGroup.
An AdditionalItemProperty SHOULD not contain a RangeDimension.
An AdditionalItemProperty SHOULD not contain an ItemPropertyRange.
A Dimension SHOULD not contain a Description.
A Dimension SHOULD not contain a MinimumMeasure.
A Dimension SHOULD not contain a MaximumMeasure.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: An ItemIdentification SHOULD not contain BarcodeSymbologyID.
An ItemIdentification SHOULD not contain PhysicalAttribute.
An ItemIdentification SHOULD not contain MeasurementDimension.
An ItemIdentification SHOULD not contain IssuerParty.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: This ID SHOULD not contain a schemeID attribute.
This ID SHOULD not contain a schemeName attribute.
This ID SHOULD not contain a schemeAgencyID attribute.
This ID SHOULD not contain a schemeAgencyName attribute.
This ID SHOULD not contain a schemeVersionID attribute.
This ID SHOULD not contain a schemeDataURI attribute.
This ID SHOULD not contain a schemeURI attribute.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: This ID SHOULD not contain a schemeName attribute.
This ID SHOULD not contain a schemeAgencyID attribute.
This ID SHOULD not contain a schemeAgencyName attribute.
This ID SHOULD not contain a schemeVersionID attribute.
This ID SHOULD not contain a schemeDataURI attribute.
This ID SHOULD not contain a schemeURI attribute.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: Description is only allowed once.
ManufacturerParty is only allowed once.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: Value is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: Measure is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: A Price SHOULD not contain a PriceChangeReason.
A Price SHOULD not contain a PriceTypeCode.
A Price SHOULD not contain an OrderableUnitFactorRate.
A Price SHOULD not contain a ValidityPeriod.
A Price SHOULD not contain a PriceList.
A Price SHOULD not contain a PricingExchangeRate.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: PriceType is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: PriceType MUST be specified as 'gross' or 'net'.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: A Delivery SHOULD not contain a MinimumQuantity.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain a MaximumQuantity.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain an ActualDeliveryDate.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain an ActualDeliveryTime.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain a LatestDeliveryDate.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain a LatestDeliveryTime.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain a ReleaseID.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain a TrackingID.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain a DeliveryAddress.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain an AlternativeDeliveryLocation.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain an EstimatedDeliveryPeriod.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain a CarrierParty.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain a DeliveryParty.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain a NotifyParty.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain a DeliveryTerms.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain a MinimumDeliveryUnit.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain a MaximumDeliveryUnit.
A Delivery SHOULD not contain a Shipment.
A RequestedDeliveryPeriod SHOULD not contain a DurationMeasure.
A RequestedDeliveryPeriod SHOULD not contain a DescriptionCode.
A RequestedDeliveryPeriod SHOULD not contain a Description.
A PromisedDeliveryPeriod SHOULD not contain a DurationMeasure.
A PromisedDeliveryPeriod SHOULD not contain a DescriptionCode.
A PromisedDeliveryPeriod SHOULD not contain a Description.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain an ID.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain a RequestedDespatchDate.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain a RequestedDespatchTime.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain an EstimatedDespatchDate.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain an EstimatedDespatchTime.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain an ActualDespatchDate.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain an ActualDespatchTime.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain a GuaranteedDespatchDate.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain a GuaranteedDespatchTime.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain a ReleaseID.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain a DespatchAddress.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain a DespatchLocation.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain a DespatchParty.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain a CarrierParty.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain a NotifyParty.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain a Contact.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain an EstimatedDespatchPeriod.
A Despatch SHOULD not contain a RequestedDespatchPeriod.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: Quantity is mandatory.
RequestedDeliveryPeriod is mandatory.
EndDate is mandatory.
Instructions is only allowed once.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: EndDate is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: The attribute unitCode is mandatory.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: A Quantity SHOULD not contain an unitCodeListID attribute.
A Quantity SHOULD not contain an unitCodeListAgencyID attribute.
A Quantity SHOULD not contain an unitCodeListAgencyName attribute.

sch:rule.fpi: Only the UBL elements specified by SCSN are allowed
sch:rule.sch:assert: A LineItem SHOULD not contain SalesOrderID.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain UUID.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain TotalTaxAmount.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain MinimumQuantity.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain MaximumQuantity.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain MinimumBackorderQuantity.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain MaximumBackorderQuantity.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain InspectionMethodCode.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain PartialDeliveryIndicator.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain BackOrderAllowedIndicator.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain AccountingCostCode.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain AccountingCost.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain WarrantyInformation.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain Delivery.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain DeliveryTerms.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain OriginatorParty.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain OrderedShipment.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain PricingReference.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain AllowanceCharge.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain WarrantyValidityPeriod.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain WarrantyParty.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain TaxTotal.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain ItemPriceExtension.
A LineItem SHOULD not contain LineReference.

sch:rule.fpi: SCSN restrictions on UBL syntax
sch:rule.sch:assert: Quantity is mandatory.
Price is mandatory.
